svg.text: Microsoft 365 A5 Security Student Use Benefit

a.text: Refer to the Microsoft Product Terms for more information, including program eligibility and staff/student ratios

svg.text: Microsoft 365 A5 Compliance has no Student Use Benefit
Microsoft 365 A3 Student Use Benefitdoes not include Defender for Endpoint Plan 1
Microsoft 365 A5 and Microsoft 365 A5 SecurityStudent Use Benefits do not include Defender for Endpoint Plan 2
